snippet.title: Swift: Firebase 3 - Installing SDK using Cocoapods and Saving Users into Database (Ep 2)
snippet.description:
Let's kick off today's episode by installing the Firebase SDK using Cocoapods.  We'll first visit https://firebase.google.com/docs/ios/setup and create our firebase project in the console area.  Next we'll follow their instructions with how to use Terminal to install the Firebase Database, Auth, and Storage pods.  Finally, I'll show you guys how to authenticate a user with an email and password, and then saving this user into our real-time database.

Part 1 - How to Create a Login Page: https://youtu.be/lWSc0wHFTXM

iOS Basic Training Course:
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/basic-training

Completed Source Code
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/course/Firebase-Chat-Messenger

Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/buildthatapp
